short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the resources that make up your website and how these impact the carbon emissions your website makes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Website Carbon Widget helps you see the resources that each page uses and the carbon emissions that are produced in real-time.
